EmailTemplate.subject: Outstanding fees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr and Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
I hope you are well.
I am writing to let you know that according to our records we have yet to receive Autumn fee payment from your company (due date August 1). We would be grateful if you could liaise with your HR department in this regards. Any feedback would be welcome.
If you have any questions in regards to the outstanding payment or would like to receive a copy of the invoice please do not hesitate to contact me at isminvoicing@britishschools.co.uk
If payment has already been arranged please accept my apologies for receiving this email. If you could direct your finance manager to me in order to track the payment I would appreciate that.
Thank you in advance.
Kind regards,
Marina Urmanova Invoicing Manager The International School of Moscow Tel: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Tel: +7 (965) 159 49 77 www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group
